channel.title: Server crashing error
channel.description:
evert now and than my server crashes getting this error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.createProjectile(client.java:3740) at client.firespell(client.java:3660) at GraphicsHandler.createSpell(GraphicsHandler.java:110) at client.Attack(client.java:19011) at client.process(client.java:11949) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) at server.main(server.java:50)

item.title: Server crashing error
item.dc:creator: @yashua yashua
item.description:
@yashua wrote:

is there anyway to stop it my server has like 60 users on and it happends every 10 less mins when i restart it[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 11:26:45 AM[/size][hr]in client.java on line 3740 you see

            outStream.createFrame(85);

its in public void createProjectile(int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int gfxMoving,[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 11:29:59 AM[/size][hr]could somone please help

Read full topic

item.title: Server crashing error

item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

That happens when you lag. Just restart it.
